# grnt-carousel

This component looks for grnt-carousel-item components inside. For each such found it registers it as an item in the carousel.
The component expands to fill space by default.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property               | Attribute                 | Description | Type     | Default     |
| ---------------------- | ------------------------- | ----------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `autoTransitionTimeMs` | `auto-transition-time-ms` |             | `number` | `undefined` |


## Events

| Event                     | Description | Type                  |
| ------------------------- | ----------- | --------------------- |
| `grntCarouselItemChanged` |             | `CustomEvent<number>` |
